metadata.title: CVE-2024-49892 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Initialize get_bytes_per_element's default to 1Variables, used as denominators and maybe not assigned to other values,should not be 0. bytes_per_element_y & bytes_per_element_c areinitialized by get_bytes_per_element() which should never return 0.This fixes 10 DIVIDE_BY_ZERO issues reported by Coverity.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
